attributes.action: appear and be interviewed live on Russell Brand's BBC Radio 2 programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Russell has mentioned on his how that he'd like to interview Gordon Brown, and I think it'd be brilliant. So come on, do it. It'll only take up one Saturday night and it might be a way of reaching those young people politicians are so interested in these days.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
